alert.note: Alert for Harnett; Johnston (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 24 at 7:17AM EDT until March 24 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Harnett County in central North Carolina... Southwestern Johnston County in central North Carolina... * Until 800 AM EDT. * At 717 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Lillington, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lillington, Dunn, Angier, Benson, Erwin, Coats and Buies Creek. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
